Translations.Text: Shvydke nablyzhennya yavlyaye soboyu rozrakhunok dlya lyudey, ale vony ye oblivious, neprykhylʹnyy
Koly dokaz prybuvaye yim z yikhnʹoho Lorda, shcho ye novi, vony slukhayutʹ tse neuvazhno
Yikhni rozum ye neuvazhni. Ta porushnyky prysudzhuyutʹ sekretno: vin ne tilʹky lyudsʹkyy vyhlyadayuchyy yak vy? Chy ne mohly b vy vyznaty zacharuvannya shcho ye prysutniy do vas
Vin skazav, "Miy Lord znaye kozhnyy podumanoho u nebesakh ta zemli. Vin yavlyaye soboyu Slukhacha, Omniscient
Vony navitʹ skazaly, "Hallucinations," "Vin vstyh," ta, "Vin ye poet. Dozvolʹte yomu pokazuyutʹ nam chudo lyublyatʹ tsi poperednikh kur'yeriv
My nikoly ne vynyshchyly viryachi spilʹnoti ranishe. Tsi viruyuchi lyudey
My ne poslaly pered tym, yak vy krim lyudey komu my nadykhnuly. Poprositʹ tsi khto znayte svyate pysannya, yakshcho vy ne znayete
My ne daly yim orhanizatsiyi shcho ne hostylysya, ne vony nevmyrushchi
My vykonaly nashu obitsyanku yim; my vryatuvaly yikh razom z whomever my willed, ta vynyshchyly porushnykiv
My poslaly vnyz do vas svyate pysannya mistyache vashe povidomlennya. Vy ne rozumiyete
